A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to like this film. Throughout the movie\, I kept trying to convince myself that what I had been seeing was 'cool' and 'unique'. In reality\, this film is a poor continuum of the Star Wars saga. The plot was horribly set up and what has been done to the legacy of the characters from the original is a disgrace. Plain and simple\, this film is heresy and blasphemy to the Star Wars universe. For two years\, we had our hopes and dreams about what would occur. Clearly\, Luke Skywalker would need to save the galaxy from this monstrous villain introduced as the most powerful of all time\, Snoke. However\, Luke is pretty much worthless in this film and Snoke has less screen time than Jar Jar Binks in the prequels. There is absolutely nothing to look forward to in the next film.
